page.title: 16Whitehills Fishing Life
page.content: {I am 33 and have been fishing since I {left school}at 17 (with 8 'O' Levels) to join my father's boat. I took my master's ticket before I was 21.{I {never seriously thought about doing {anything else. I don't consider it {particularly dangerous.}With decked in shelters and modern communications accidents are due usually more to foolhardiness and carelessness than anything else. {I prefer to fish out of Whitehills}and within about 100 miles radius. Many boats go from Whitehills to the West Coast. This is a very lucrative fishing area, but it involves time and expense getting there and back.{My {co-owner and I are family men with {wives and families to consider. I prefer to land at Whitehills, but if I am fishing off Peterhead or Fraserburgh I land for my best market.
